title: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects. When trying to view scoped type hierarchy for binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, could you clarify the meaning of this error message?
OB: When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy for binary projects, no class hierarchies of the internal jars are displayed.
EB: When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy for binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR:
1. Open a binary project
2. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy for a specific package (e.g. org.apache.ant)
